marklogic.body: I agree with you on some things. Global warming ? We do know of can not prove anything. Study the sunspot cycles. The sun dose not Burn at a constant never has never will. I do not deny global warming just no prof . We do not even have prof oil is a fossil fuel. Could be a republican plan to make more money for big oil. You have some very valid points . I just do not buy global warming should be are biggest concern. World changes had Always will. In the 70s it was global cooling we were worried about .
